title: Principles of Theory
description: Advanced exploration of theory covering current research and industry practices.

title: Principles of Practice
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in practice. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Applied Practice
description: Rigorous treatment of practice theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Intermediate Theory
description: Comprehensive study of theory with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Advanced Seminar
description: Advanced exploration of seminar covering current research and industry practices.

title: Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Seminar
description: Interdisciplinary approach to seminar combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Advanced Seminar
description: Interdisciplinary approach to seminar combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: ACCT 356 and senior standing or graduate status
